venue.address_1: will send address out to RSVP'ers
venue.name: In a cabin in the woods...

item.description:
Got the winter blues? Come sit by the fire, sip some brew and chill out.

Get Great Grannies' recipe out, dust off your sifter, and make 5 dozen of your

special cookies/bars/candies etc. Bring your platter of goodies to the swap to share. Leave with the same amount of everyone elseâ€™s treasures!

I will supply some hot brew and noshes.

Send me your recipe ahead of time and I will collate them and make a booklet for everyone to take home.

P.S. If there is any fluffy snow on the ground, be prepared for a snowman building contest after a few brews!!!!!!!!!
item.name: CABIN COOKIE SWAP
